title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. V, subch. D, pt. 545 - Accounts, Records And Reports Of General Business Corporations Providing Incidental Utility Service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. V, subch. D, pt. 545 - Accounts, Records And Reports Of General Business Corporations Providing Incidental Utility Service

State Regulations
§ 545.1 - Petition for exemption from requirements
§ 545.2 - Action on petition

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. V, subch. D, pt. 545

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§ 4[1], 5[2], 7[1], 16 [1], 20[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
